Articles.Content:
Is anyone interested in designing a Banner for my F-117 challenge?

Is any one interested in designing a Sig-pic for my F-117 challenge?

Here's my thoughts:

The banner would go across the top of the challenge page, and have an F-117 somewhere in the logo.

The sig-pic would be three-fold: one for completion of the challenge, one for gatecrashers, and one for F-19's.

Any thoughts/help?

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/121473-For-The-Stealthiest#post1942301](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/121473-For-The-Stealthiest#post1942301)

Banner?! Ooh!

Maybe I can do this tomorrow.

Too bad the render plugins are still down. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

I could try making one though it cant be a 3D render, but I can try taking an in game screenshot and some f-117 logos and what not ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Sounds good! The render part is not too important, as all the crafts will be different. Maybe try using an F-117 and photoshop?

How is this? If you like it, then I can make a sig banner ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

![vScCq2R.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/vScCq2R.jpg)
Looks very nice! I'm adding it as the banner as we speak!
I'm still looking for 3 participant badges. Anyone interested?
